terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Please read and agree to the following terms before making your reservation.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: If you cancel more than 24 hours before your scheduled visit time, a full refund will be issued to the payment method used at the time of reservation. If you cancel within 24 hours of your scheduled visit time, a full refund will be issued after deducting a 200-yen cancellation fee. All refunds and cancellation fee charges will be processed through the same payment method used at the time of reservation.

email.title: Email Address
email.content: Please ensure that the email address you enter is valid. If an incorrect email address is provided, the confirmation email may not be delivered, and your reservation will not be completed.

plateOnly.title: Plate-Only Option
plateOnly.content: If you choose the "plate-only" option, please select your cake at your table on the day of your visit. Prices vary depending on the product you choose on the day.

arrival.title: Upon Arrival
arrival.content: When you arrive, please inform the staff on the first floor of your reservation details by providing your reservation number.

seating.title: Seating
seating.content: We do not accept seat reservations. If the café is full, we kindly ask for your patience as there may be a short wait.

takeaway.title: Take-Out
takeaway.content: If you are unable to finish your cake during your visit, the remaining portion may be taken home.

additional.title: Additional Orders
additional.content: You may order additional drinks or other items.

changes.title: Changes to Your Reservation
changes.content: If you wish to make changes to your reservation, please contact us by email or phone at least 24 hours before your scheduled visit time.
